sn12.47:1.2: Atha kho jāṇussoṇi brāhmaṇo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavatā saddhiṁ …pe… ekamantaṁ nisinno kho jāṇussoṇi brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn12.47:3.2: “‘Sabbaṁ natthī’ti kho, brāhmaṇa, ayaṁ dutiyo anto.
sn12.47:3.3: Ete te, brāhmaṇa, ubho ante anupagamma majjhena tathāgato dhammaṁ deseti:
sn12.47:4.1: Evaṁ vutte, jāṇussoṇi brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
